ModMetaData.name: Targeting Modes [1.1]
ModMetaData.author: XeoNovaDan + OdysseyScorpio
ModMetaData.description:
Current Version: v2.0.0 (18th March 2020)

Updated to work with 1.1 and keep existing compatability with 1.0(untested at this time) - Please let me know if you spot any thing out of place with this.
 Previous Version: v1.1.7 (29th July 2019)

V.A.T.S for RimWorld! Allow your colonists, obedient animals and even some raiders to prioritize targeting certain body part groups of their enemies. Shoot those heads off in style!


 
I did not create this mod, I only updated it to work with 1.1/
Original Credits go to XeoNovaDan aka XND 
https://github.com/XeoNovaDan/TargetingModes
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1508165821
